settings.heading: When are we sending out your subscription coffees?
settings.row_content: We typically take 1 to 3 working days from your order date to ensure freshness before shipping it to you.

settings.heading: Which coffees will I be receiving?
settings.row_content: Our roast team selects the subscriber coffees every month. They are typically our latest releases and often microlots. When you are starting your subscription you can chose between espresso and filter roasts.

settings.heading: What is the price advantage compared to single web orders?
settings.row_content: The price advantages of our subscription vary. The average minimum price advantage is 25% compared to single web orders. The highest discount can be achieved by booking a pre-paid term subscription.

settings.heading: I have just signed up for a subscription. When will I receive my coffee?
settings.row_content:
Your first subscription goes out the next working day after you started your subscription.

The only exception is our Masterpiece subscription. This one we send out on the first Wednesday of each month. All other subscription are fully flexible and you can change your desired dispatch date via your online portal.

You can also pause or skip your subscription at any point. The time to reach you with your freshly roasted coffee depends on your location and the service that you have chosen. For exact durations visit our shipping policies page.

settings.heading: How can I adjust my coffee subscription?
settings.row_content: Navigate to the "menu" and select "login" to access your account information. On the left, choose "manage subscription" to make any necessary edits. If you'd like to avoid waiting, you can utilize the Send Now feature. Additionally, you have the flexibility to reschedule or skip a delivery according to your preferences.

settings.text_subtitle_primary:
World Class Single Origin Coffee
Freshly roasted in Berlin
Delivered to your door - every month
settings.text_subtitle_secondary: From Crop to Cup we personally get involved with all the humans in the coffee chain.
settings.text_subtitle_secondary_2: Our mission: to deliver world class single origin coffee to you!
settings.ROASTERY_OPENING: We deliver in more than 50 countries worldwide and work with reliable professionals, so you can enjoy your coffee as soon as possible.
settings.ROASTERY_OPENING_1: We have strict rules, when it comes to coffee roasting. We roast green beans to order, so you are guaranteed to always receive the freshest beans.
settings.ROASTERY_OPENING_2: We source our Single Origin Coffe directly from producers all across the globe. Direct trade means better quality and ensures sustainability on both sides.
settings.text_subtitle: With thousands of subscribers we aim to deliver the best Coffe Subscription experience there is.
